resources.string: Something happened while trying to detect devices.
Now your phone will ask you to turn on bluetooth and give you permission to geolocate. This is normal, Bluetooth LE requires this permission to connect
To connect to Flipper Zero we need Bluetooth enabled
We need all these permissions to connect to the device. You can read more about how we use these permissions at blog.flipperzero.one
Connected to the device. Establishing a connection…
For some reason, the device broke the connection. This is not ok, check the firmware of the device.
The system broke the connection process, try again
The system returned an incorrect response. Please try again, or write to feedback@flipperzero.one if the problem repeat.
